name: A Corgi At Night
description:
A Corgi at Night is a 2D side scrolling platformer where you play as a cute corgi named Quinn! Help Quinn find his way back home to his owners while avoiding a myriad of enemies that want to hurt and impound stray dogs!

______

Controls

Left, Right - Move

Down - Crouch

Space - Jump

E- bark

Q - hide

R - use wormholes

Enter - dialogue

ESC - access Pause menu and Controls ingame

Team

Project Leads - Nazely Hartoonian | Ulises Perez

Artists - Claudia O'Flaherty | Yixuan (Angela) Li | Rachel Lee | Victoria Barinova

Programmers - Ulises Perez | Yixuan (Angela) Li

Audio Designer - Brandon Delehoy
